effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is punched with the user’s full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is punched with the user’s full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.
